Actions.Name: Rake
Actions.PostAttack: Hellion can fly to any point on the line after the attack.

Actions.Name: Pinions
Actions.Description: Deal fray damage 4 times to foes in range 3. Each foe in range must be hit at least once before being hit by another pinion.

Actions.Name: Swoop
Actions.Description: End turn and leave the battlefield. Return to the battlefield in a visible free space at start of next turn with stealth.
